comments: a(n) = number of Dyck (n-1)-paths that contain no DUDUs and no UUDDs (n>=3). For example, a(5)=3 counts UUUDUDDD, UDUUDUDD, UUDUDDUD. - _David Callan_, Sep 25 2006
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1 + x + 2 x^2 - Sqrt[1 - 2 x - 3 x^2 + 4 x^4]) / 2 / x, {x, 0, 40}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Feb 15 2015 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
